title: An Act directing the city of Boston police department to waive the maximum age requirement for police officers for Ryan Cazeau

abstracts.abstract: By Representative MacGregor of Boston, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 4740) of William F. MacGregor (with the approval of the mayor and city council) for legislation to authorize the appointment of Ryan Cazeau as a police officer in the city of Boston, notwithstanding the maximum age requirement.  Public Service.  [Local Approval Received.]

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Public Service
Hearing scheduled for 01/27/2026 from 01:00 PM-05:00 PM in B-1

Hearing rescheduled to 01/27/2026 from 01:00 PM-01:15 PM in B-1                                                                                                                                          and Virtual Hearing updated to New End Time
Bill reported favorably by committee and referred to the committee on House Steering, Policy and Scheduling

related_entities.name: committee on House Steering, Policy and Scheduling
the committee on House Steering, Policy and Scheduling
